item.title: Mike add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "Why do you go away? So that you can come back. So that you can see the place you came from with new eyes and extra colors. And the people there see you differently, too. Coming back to where you started is not the same as never leaving." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Mike add a quote by Robert Louis Stevenson
item.description: "I travel not to go anywhere, but to go. I travel for travel's sake. The great affair is to move." -- Robert Louis Stevenson

item.title: Mike add a quote by Marcel Proust
item.description: "The real voyage of discovery consists not in seeking new landscapes, but in having new eyes." -- Marcel Proust

item.title: Mike add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "I have found out that there ain't no surer way to find out whether you like people or hate them than to travel with them." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Mike add a quote by G.K. Chesterton
item.description: "The traveler sees what he sees. The tourist sees what he has come to see." -- G.K. Chesterton

item.title: Mike add a quote by Henry Miller
item.description: "One's destination is never a place, but a new way of seeing things." -- Henry Miller
